text:
The solution was simple. You just had to accept the cost.

Balance must be maintained. The Tyger needs to eat.

Maude gives you the keys. She looks tired. She looks relieved.

"It's your shift now, hon," she says.

You sit behind the desk. You open the ledger.

A young man walks in. He looks scared. He looks like he's looking for answers.

"No vacancies," you say.

But you're smiling.

And your eyes are flat, dead things.
